Reference
============================

* Source code: `Github <https://github.com/saberyoung/sn_data_analysis>`_

* HAFFET paper: `Yang et al 2022 <https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2021A%26A...655A..90Y/abstract>`_ (the :download:`bib file <reference/haffet.bib>`)

* Papers using HAFFET: `ADS <https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/user/libraries/FyVqsR5nTuS1_JJvnioyMQ>`_
